T02D2553:19b-1: sgrub pa po dad pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag
T02D2553:19b-2: gis mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas bskor
T02D2553:20a-2: bdag nyid 'jam dpal gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas
T02D2553:20a-3: sa phyogs de skyang nul byas te dri zhim pos
T02D2553:20a-5: sku gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa'i rten mngon par bzhag ste /
T02D2553:20a-6: sa phyogs de nyid du yi ge hr'i: las nges
T02D2553:20a-7: par byung ba'i padma dkar po 'dab ma sna tshogs
T02D2553:20a-8: pa yal ga dang bcas pa bsams la dbus su
T02D2553:20a-9: seng ge'i khri la zla ba'i steng du sprul pa'i
T02D2553:20a-10: sku rnam par snang mdzad sh'akya thub pa chos 'chad
T02D2553:20a-11: pa'i phyag rgya can gser gyi kha dog can mtshan
T02D2553:20a-12: dang dpe byad kyis brgyan par bltas la /
T02D2553:20a-13: de'i g-yas na 'jam dpal kha dog kha ba la gur gum gtor ba lta bu /
T02D2553:20a-14: mchog sbyin pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa /
T02D2553:20a-15: g-yon na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs la nyi ma shar ba lta bu /
T02D2553:20a-16: ngag gi dbang phyug 'gying ba'i tshul du gnas te
T02D2553:20a-17: sems can la bdud rtsi sbyin par mdzad pa dang
T02D2553:20a-18: / mdun du phyag na rdo rje bee d'urya'i mdog can g-yas rdo rje thugs kar bstod de /
T02D2553:20a-19: g-yon pa zhi ba'i phyag rgya can /
T02D2553:20a-20: de'i phyi rol na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis bskor ba /
T02D2553:20a-21: de'i phyi rol na byang chub sems dpa' stong du bzhis ma tshang bas bskor ba /
T02D2553:20a-22: de la phyi rim na 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyis bskor ba bltas te /
T02D2553:20a-23: de la dad pa bskyed cing phyag 'tshal nas bskor
T02D2553:20a-24: ba bya ba ni mtshan gdon pa'am ye shes sems
T02D2553:20a-25: dpa'i sku'i phreng sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D2553:20a-26: de lta bu'i bskor ba ji srid nus pa de srid du byas te /
T02D2553:20a-27: bde bar gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du 'dug la /
T02D2553:20a-28: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang //
T02D2553:20a-29: chos rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2553:20a-30: dge 'dun rjes su dran par byas la /
T02D2553:20a-31: snying gnas sbrul ba'i mchod pas mchod de /
T02D2553:20a-32: 'dud nyi shus yang dag par bstod la /
T02D2553:20a-33: sdig pa bshags pa dang rjes su yi rang ba
T02D2553:20a-34: la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed do
T02D2553:20a-35: // de nas de rnams kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer byung nas bdag la g-yas su bskor te /
T02D2553:20a-36: bdag gi snying gar thib par bsams pa'i byin rlabs
T02D2553:20a-37: kyis las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrub pa dag nas
T02D2553:20a-38: lus kyang chu zla lta bur bsam mo //
T02D2553:20a-39: de ltar dge ba byas pa'i bsod nams rdzogs pa'i
T02D2553:20a-40: byang chub por bsngos la de rnams kyang mi snang
T02D2553:20b-1: / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bskor ba bya
